meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brenda Parks Dan Alves Pamela Norris Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #340.

td.p: Brenda Parks, a marketing sales manager from Yorba Linda, California
Dan Alves, from Santa Maria, California
Pamela Norris, a writer from Sandy Springs, Georgia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $23,000)

tr.td: POTENT POTABLES
CARDS
MOVIES
RULERS
PROVERBS
JUST DESSERTS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'When his name is used to describe a brandy, it usually means it\'s over 5 years old')

tr.td: When his name is used to describe a brandy, it usually means it's over 5 years old
